verses.text: \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w basket|strong="H3619"\w* \w of|strong="H3069"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w*.\f + \fr 8:1 \ft Or ripe fruit; also in verse 2\f*

“\w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w basket|strong="H3619"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w*,” \w I|strong="H7200"\w* replied. \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5674"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w spare|strong="H5674"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.”

“\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \f + \fr 8:3 \ft Or the singing women\f* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \f + \fr 8:3 \ft Or palace\f* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w turn|strong="H3213"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w wailing|strong="H3213"\w*. \w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w corpses|strong="H6297"\w*, strewn \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w silence|strong="H2013"\w* \w everywhere|strong="H3605"\w*!”

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w you|strong="H7673"\w* who \w trample|strong="H7602"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* needy, who \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w away|strong="H7673"\w* \w with|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w poor|strong="H6035"\w* \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land,

asking, “\w When|strong="H4970"\w* \w will|strong="H4820"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w New|strong="H2320"\w* \w Moon|strong="H2320"\w* \w be|strong="H2320"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, \w that|strong="H5674"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1431"\w* \w sell|strong="H7666"\w* \w grain|strong="H1250"\w*? \w When|strong="H4970"\w* \w will|strong="H4820"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* end, \w that|strong="H5674"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1431"\w* market \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*? Let \w us|strong="H5674"\w* reduce \w the|strong="H5674"\w* ephah \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w increase|strong="H1431"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*;\f + \fr 8:5 \ft Or Let us reduce the measure and increase the price\f* let \w us|strong="H5674"\w* \w cheat|strong="H5791"\w* \w with|strong="H5674"\w* \w dishonest|strong="H4820"\w* \w scales|strong="H3976"\w*.

Let us \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H7069"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w with|strong="H1800"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H7069"\w* \w needy|strong="H1800"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pair \w of|strong="H7069"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w*, selling even \w the|strong="H7069"\w* chaff \w with|strong="H1800"\w* \w the|strong="H7069"\w* \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*!”

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: “\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H5331"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4639"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H4714"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w quake|strong="H7264"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* dwellers \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w*? \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* swell \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*; \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* surge \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w then|strong="H5927"\w* subside \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H2821"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* down \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w darken|strong="H2821"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w earth|strong="H8121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* daytime.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w feasts|strong="H2282"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* mourning \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* cause \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w wear|strong="H5927"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* shaved. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* mourning \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w only|strong="H3173"\w* \w son|strong="H3173"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* outcome \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w coming|strong="H2009"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land— \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w People|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stagger|strong="H5128"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w roam|strong="H7751"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* lovely \w young|strong="H3117"\w* \w women|strong="H1330"\w*— \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w young|strong="H3117"\w* men \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w well|strong="H3303"\w*— \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w faint|strong="H5968"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.

Those \w who|strong="H2416"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* guilt \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* say, ‘\w As|strong="H6965"\w* \w surely|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w god|strong="H3808"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*,’ \w or|strong="H3808"\w*, ‘\w As|strong="H6965"\w* \w surely|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \f + \fr 8:14 \ft Or the god\f* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Beersheba \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*’— \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*.”
